title: Individualized Online Language Learning Program for Students with Intellectual Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Comprehension and Daily Conversational Skills
context.additional_context: Program for developing functional language proficiency tailored to individual learning needs and enhancing social interaction skills

learning_goals: Learners improve daily language proficiency by over 50% through individualized learning plans.
Learners will acquire at least three social communication skills (e.g., greetings, requests, expressions of gratitude) through interactive activities within the LMS.
Learners will perform functional reading/writing tasks (e.g., composing simple notes, reading price tags) with 80% accuracy through repeated practice.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
